`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-js",children:`// utils/dataProcessor.js

const fs = require("fs");
let rawData = fs.readFileSync("../data/rawData.json");
let jsonData = JSON.parse(rawData);

let processedData = jsonData.records.map((record) => {
  return {
    parkingName: record.\uC8FC\uCC28\uC7A5\uBA85,
    parkingType: record.\uC8FC\uCC28\uC7A5\uAD6C\uBD84,
    roadAddress: record.\uC18C\uC7AC\uC9C0\uB3C4\uB85C\uBA85\uC8FC\uC18C,
    address: record.\uC18C\uC7AC\uC9C0\uC9C0\uBC88\uC8FC\uC18C,
    feeInfo: record.\uC694\uAE08\uC815\uBCF4,
    latitude: record.\uC704\uB3C4,
    longitude: record.\uACBD\uB3C4,
  };
});

fs.writeFileSync(
  "../data/processedData.json",
  JSON.stringify(processedData, null, 2)
);
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/songhaeun/Desktop/dev/songhaeun-blog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-ef1c2a02-469f-4cf7-a57f-36ddc4d2c78e.mdx",lineNumber:50,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/songhaeun/Desktop/dev/songhaeun-blog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-ef1c2a02-469f-4cf7-a57f-36ddc4d2c78e.mdx",lineNumber:50,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-js",children:`// models/parking.js

const { DataTypes } = require("sequelize");
const sequelize = require("../config/config");

sequelize
  .sync({ force: false })
  .then(() => {
    console.log("Table \uC0DD\uC131");
  })
  .catch((error) => {
    console.error("Error creating tables:", error);
  });

const Parking = sequelize.define(
  "Parking",
  {
    parkingName: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING,
      allowNull: false,
    },
    ...
    longitude: {
      type: DataTypes.STRING,
      allowNull: false,
    },
  },
  {
    tableName: "parkings",
    timestamps: false,
  }

const fs = require("fs");

// \uAC00\uACF5\uB41C JSON \uD30C\uC77C \uC77D\uAE30
fs.readFile("../data/processedData.json", "utf8", async (err, data) => {
  if (err) {
    console.error("Error reading file:", err);
    return;
  }

  // \uB370\uC774\uD130 \uD30C\uC2F1
  const parkings = JSON.parse(data);

  try {
    // \uB370\uC774\uD130\uBCA0\uC774\uC2A4\uC5D0 \uBAA8\uB4E0 \uC8FC\uCC28\uC7A5 \uC815\uBCF4 \uC0BD\uC785
    await Parking.bulkCreate(parkings);
    console.log("db \uC0BD\uC785 \uC644\uB8CC");
  } catch (error) {
    console.error("Error inserting data:", error);
  }
});
